name: Dream Maker
passive: Dreamer: Gain two Dream Bubbles every 6 seconds.
active: Heals or shields blows both Dream Bubbles to them, empowering hem for 3 seconds. The two bubbles grant their nest hit 15-90 bonus outgoing magic damage ( ) and a 15-30% Movement Speed bonus for 3 seconds. 500 Dream Maker TIPS: This boot enchant generates two “dream bubbles” at regular intervals. When you heal or shield an ally, both bubbles burst on them, empowering their next hit with bonus magic damage and granting a temporary movement speed boost. — Perfect for enchanter supports who want to both protect their team and empower their carries with extra damage and mobility at critical moments.

This boot enchant generates two “dream bubbles” at regular intervals.
When you heal or shield an ally, both bubbles burst on them, empowering their next hit with bonus magic damage and granting a temporary movement speed boost.
— Perfect for enchanter supports who want to both protect their team and empower their carries with extra damage and mobility at critical moments.
